description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ftlj0","text":"This protocol describes laboratory methods for sequencing a standard COI marker (i.e. DNA barcoding), multiplexing up to 2,280 specimens (24 x 96 well plates, with one negative control well per plate), to run on an Oxford Nanopore Technologies Flongle 10.4.1 Flow Cell on a MinION sequencer. All indexing is accomplished by PCR using tagged primers, meaning that library prep is only carried out in a single tube with all 2,280 PCRs pooled. This is accomplished by asymmetrical indexing, where forward primers carrying 96 Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMIs) provide mapping to a well of a 96-well plate, and reverse primers with 24 UMIs provide mapping to the plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b33a2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"50shc","text":"The protocol details all primer sequences (attached as a text table) and gives instructions for manufacturing batches of pre-made indexed plates, carrying out PCR, pooling and library prep for the ONT platform, and loading onto the sequencing device.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"fgobi","text":"This protocol describes laboratory protocols for sequencing a standard COI marker (i.e. DNA barcoding), multiplexing up to 2,280 specimens (24 x 96 well plates, with one negative control well per plate), to run on an Oxford Nanopore Technologies Flongle 10.4.1 Flow Cell on a MinION sequencer. All indexing is accomplished by PCR using tagged primers, meaning that library prep is only carried out in a single tube with all 2,280 PCRs pooled. This is accomplished by asymmetrical indexing, where forward primers carrying 96 Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMIs) provide mapping to a well of a 96-well plate, and reverse primers with 24 UMIs provide mapping to the plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24sgm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ak95c","text":"The protocol details all primer sequences (attached as a text table) and gives instructions for manufacturing batches of pre-made indexed plates, carrying out PCR, pooling and library prep for the ONT platform, and loading onto the sequencing device.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhros","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2r77g","text":"It is recommended that:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c1g1d","text":"-reagent prep","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27i95","text":"-DNA extraction","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7uo6l","text":"-all post-PCR steps including Library prep ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9blnt","text":"should be carried out in three different rooms or otherwise physically separated spaces to avoid cross-contamination.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6kqr7","text":"Transfer all 15 uL End Prep reaction to a new 1.5 mL LoBind tube and mix with 15 uL Ampure XP beads. Mix well by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cvt00","text":"Incubate 5 minutes at room temperature, mixing occasionally by gently flicking the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a4gum","text":"Place tube on magnetic rack. Wait 1-2 minutes until supernatant is clear, then remove and discard supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bmull","text":"Leaving tube on magnetic rack, wash with 200 uL of 70% ethanol (prepared on same day).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"em837","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2u7sd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2bkda","text":"Remove and discard ethanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"696mv","text":"Repeat steps 16.4 and 16.5 for a total of two washes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6g8p","text":"After the second ethanol removal, place tube in mini centrifuge and spin for a few seconds to collect all remaining ethanol at the bottom of the tube. Return tube to magnetic rack and use a P20 pipette to remove the last ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7p0kq","text":"Leave tube open at room temperature for 1-2 minutes to allow residual ethanol to dry (beads are sufficiently dry when they take on a dull appearance; do not over-dry).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"32ng2","text":"Cleanup final library using Ampure XP beads: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"12o19","text":"Add 12.5 uL (0.5x) volume of Ampure XP beads and mix well by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9rcc","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1d6bi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"12.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"70c17","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 10 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"atf6b","text":"Place tube on magnetic rack. Wait 1-2 minutes until supernatant is clear, then remove and discard supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"803ro","text":"Remove tube from rack and add 100 uL Short Fragment Buffer (SFB - from Ligation Sequencing Kit SQK-LSK114). Pipette up and down or flick tube to resuspend beads. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9g3or","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21b41","text":"Return tube to magnetic rack. Wait 1-2 minutes until supernatant is clear, then remove and discard supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"v87r","text":"Repeat steps 18.4 and 18.5 for a total of two washes in SFB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1mhe0","text":"After the second wash, place tube in mini centrifuge and spin for a few seconds to collect all remaining SFB at the bottom of the tube. Return tube to magnetic rack and use a P20 pipette to remove the last SFB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68a6i","text":"Air dry pellet for no more than 30 seconds, then add 11 uL Elution Buffer (EB - from Ligation Sequencing Kit SQK-LSK114) and resuspend pellet by pipetting up and down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4iof6","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9esvi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"11","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8klfj","text":"Incubate for 10 minutes at room temperature or optionally, for increased recovery, place on thermocycler block set to 37C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6tpql","text":"Return tube to magnetic rack. {"blocks":[{"key":"evfo","text":"In MinKNOW software, navigate to “Flow Cell Check”. {"blocks":[{"key":"9rc0q","text":"Navigate to “Start Sequencing” in MinKNOW software and begin run. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5f6dr","text":"Carry out magnetic bead cleanup:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eit34","text":"Leaving tube on magnetic rack, add 500 ul of freshly-prepared 70% ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1in7o","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"27if7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fn2rp","text":"Remove and discard ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7i8c","text":"Repeat steps 13.4 and 13.5 for a total of two ethanol washes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f26o3","text":"After the second ethanol removal, place tube in mini centrifuge and spin for a few seconds to collect all remaining ethanol at the bottom of the tube. Return tube to magnetic rack and use a P20 pipette to remove the last ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7u4v0","text":"Leave tube open at room temperature for 1-2 minutes to allow residual ethanol to dry (beads are sufficiently dry when they take on a matte appearance; do not over-dry).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aaai8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"faoc6","text":"To elute DNA, remove tube from magnetic rack and add 40 ul of molecular-grade water. Resuspend beads by pipetting up and down or by flicking tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4k426","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1j2uj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bevr","text":"Incubate 10 minutes at room temperature, mixing occasionally by gently flicking the tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4sv45","text":"Return tube to magnetic rack. Wait 1 minute until supernatant is clear, then transfer 38 uL  supernatant to fresh 1.5 ml eppendorf tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f4tbp","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aerno","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"38","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"594vg","text":"Combine equal volumes of each plate pool (maximum 24), such that the final volume will be at least 200 uL (e.g. 50 uL from each tube). Mix well and take 200 uL of the single pool into a new 1.5ml eppendorf tube (exact amount is not critical, 200 uL provides an excess of final DNA in most cases). Store excess pools at -20°C in case repeat runs are needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4q5nn","text":"Add 0.8x volume of Ampure XP beads (e.g. for 200 uL pooled PCRs, add 160 uL beads). Mix well by pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m4sk","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"as76g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"160","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4k458","text":"Incubate ~10 minutes at room temperature, mixing occasionally by gently flicking the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"978l0","text":"During this incubation, prepare 70% ethanol (e.g. mix 1.4 mL 100% ethanol + 0.6 mL molecular-grade water for 2 ml, sufficient for this wash and the later washes in Step 16).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b1c83","text":"Place bead-pool tube on magnetic rack. Wait 1-2 minutes until supernatant is clear, then remove and discard supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7tru3","text":"To elute DNA, Remove tube from magnetic rack and add 16 uL of molecular-grade water. Resuspend beads by pipetting up and down or by flicking tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcf9s","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c48nr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"16","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"815j2","text":"Incubate 5 minutes at room temperature, mixing occasionally by gently flicking the tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"98f6n","text":"Return tube to magnetic rack. Wait ~1 minute until supernatant is clear, then transfer 15 uL supernatant to fresh 1.5 ml LoBind tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7fbbo","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"869d7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"15","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3gi0v","text":"Ethanol is highly flammable and must be kept away from heat sources and flames. Waste ethanol should be disposed of by appropriate chemical waste route in accordance with local regulations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
